verses.1: Saulʼ tapa Ishbosheth in Hebron ah Abner a sihna thu a zak ciangin a tha kiam a, Israel-te khempeuh lungkia hi.
verses.2: Saulʼ tapa in galsim pawlte a makai mi nih nei hi. Khat paʼ min Baanah hi-in, a dang khat paʼ min Rekhab hi a, Beeroth khua pan Benjamin mi Rimmonʼ tapate ahi uh hi. (Bang hang hiam cih leh Beeroth zong Benjamin aʼ in kisim hi.
verses.3: Beeroth mite Gittaim ah tai uh a, tu ni dongin tua lai ah peemta-in om uh hi.)
verses.4: Saulʼ tapa Jonathan in a khe zaw tapa khat nei hi. Jezreel panin Saul le Jonathanʼ thu hong tunin amah kum nga pha hi. Amah a cingnu in amah la-in taipih a, tua nu a nawh taina lamin naupang kia-in a khe zaw hi. Ama min Mefibosheth ahi hi.
verses.5: Tu-in Beeroth mi Rimmonʼ tapate Rekhab le Baanah ding khia uh a, sun nisat hun pawlin Ishboshethʼ inn ah a sun tawlngak laitakin hong tung uh hi.
verses.6: Inn kongcing nu mangbuh a su khin hi a, a lusuk suakin ihmu hi. Tua ahih ciangin Rekhab le a sanggampa Baanah simlut uh hi.
verses.7: Amaute inn sungah a tun uh ciangin a lupna dei sunga lupna tungah Ishbosheth lumin a om laitakin amaute in amah satin that uh a, a lu tan uh hi. Amaute in ama lu la-in Arabah lam tawnin zan tawntung pai uh a,
verses.8: Ishboshethʼ lutang Hebron-a Davidʼ kiang tunpih uh hi. Amaute in kumpipa kiangah, “Hih lai ah, thah dingin nang a hong zong, na gal Saulʼ tapa Ishboshethʼ lutang om hi. Topa in tu ni-in Saul le a suanlekhakte tungah koteʼ to kumpipa adingin hong thuksak hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.9: Ahih hangin David in Beeroth mi Rimmonʼ tapate Rekhab le a sanggampa Baanah dawngin, “Haksatna khempeuh panin ka nuntakna hong hon khia Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin,
verses.10: mi khat in kei kiangah, ‘En in, Saul si hi,’ ci-in hong gen ciangin, amah thuhoih puakin kingaihsun a, ama thu puak thaman ka piakna-in amah manin Ziklag ah ka that hi.
verses.11: Migilote in a thuman mi khat ama inn sung a lupna tungah a thah ciangin noteʼ tungah ama phu hong la-in, leitung panin note hong susia zaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin David in a tangvalte thu pia a, tangvalte in amaute thatin a khut le a khete sattan uh a, Hebron-a bual gei ah amaute khai uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in Ishboshethʼ lutang la-in Hebron-a Abnerʼ hanah a vui uh hi.
